effects.display_string: Set: Tidal Waves increases the healing of affected spells by 10%.
Set: Tidal Waves is 80% more effective and reduces the mana cost of affected spells by 8%.

Transmogrified to:
Spangenhelm of the Cinderwolf

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 379 Versatility for 10 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells dispatch a spider to spy on your foes, increasing your Intellect by 75 per report received. Stacks up to 40 times. This effect may only occur every 6 sec.
Use: Use your accumulated knowledge to strike when the time is right, granting 695 Intellect per report for 20 sec and consuming their passive effect. (20 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,162 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 66,434 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
